Reviews.Title: “Best Stay in UAE”

Reviews.Content: checked 29th jan 2012 bedroom kitchen hall cheap nice shopping mall pool food 2 min walk metro green line lulu hyper 10 min walk loved believe 640 stay

Reviews.Title: “Good for family”
Reviews.Author: S_H_A_I_K_19
Reviews.Content: stayed al centre residence family child age 3 yrs overall stay definitely recommend families easy access al metro station 5 mintutes walk stayed deluxe nice supermarket shopping mall building helpful mac donalds 24 hrs building swimmimg pool laundry service available free cost drop pick clothes breakfast ok improvement times crowded bell captain service staff shortage cause delay service busy time house keeping suite look fresh day charging im happy stay enjoyable

Reviews.Title: “okish”
Reviews.Author: firenzie
Reviews.Content: arrived 430 morning staff polite helpful surprised 2 single beds called london 10 booking 1 accomodate 2 adults 1 11 child time time told didnt tell truth booking fairly dissapointed buffet manager 15 mini name maybe 40 minutes concluded utterly shocked response tell free checkout horrible service paid £70 night booking fairmont 3 days left pls evening change opinion bide time moved onto fabulous holiday riches son staying hotel al station 5 min walk mc mini market premesis fast check checkout reasonable breakfast restaurant selection hot cold food bad dishonesty basic smelling run
